entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 06:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Local blowing snow this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets this evening. Periods of freezing rain beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
